  • Web Visualization API

Web Visualization API¶

Web-based visualization of the COVID-19 cases in Norwegian counties made publicly available by the Norwegian Institute of Public Health (NIPH - FHI).

web_visualization.read_data(county='all_counties', time_interval='daily')[source]¶

Read COVID-19 cases in Norwegian counties into Pandas DataFrame.

Read data of COVID-19 cases in a specified Norwegian county from a comma-separated values (csv) file provided by the Norwegian Institute of Public Health (NIPH - FHI) into a Pandas DataFrame. The county can be specified by the county keyword argument. The time interval representation of reported cases can be specifed as either daily or weekly by the time_interval keyword argument.

Parameters

  • county (str, optional, default all_counties) – The county with the reported cases to retrieve and store in DataFrame.

    Allowed counties: all_counties, agder, innlandet, more-og-romsdal, nordland, oslo, rogaland, troms-og-finnmark, trondelag, vestfold-og-telemark, vestland, viken.

  • time_interval (str, optional, default daily) – Time interval representation of the reported cases. Can be either daily or weekly.

Returns

df – The reported cases (csv file) is returned as two-dimensional data structure with labeled axes.

Return type

pandas.Dataframe

Raises

  • TypeError – If county or time_interval is not str.

  • ValueError – If county is not in allowed counties (see above) or if time_interval is not daily or weekly.

web_visualization.chart_base(county='all_counties', time_interval='daily', start=datetime.date(2020, 2, 21), end=datetime.date(2020, 11, 9))[source]¶

Create base of Altair Chart for COVID-19 cases in Norwegian counties.

Parameters

  • county (str, optional, default all_counties) – The county with the reported cases to retrieve and store in DataFrame.

    Allowed counties: all_counties, agder, innlandet, more-og-romsdal, nordland, oslo, rogaland, troms-og-finnmark, trondelag, vestfold-og-telemark, vestland, viken.

  • time_interval (str, optional, default daily) – Time interval representation of the reported cases. Can be either daily or weekly.

  • start (datetime object, optional, default datetime.date(2020, 2, 21)) – Start date of reported cases to represent in Altair Chart. The object defaults to the date of the outbreak in Norway (Feb 21, 2020).

  • end (datetime object, optional, default datetime.date(2020, 11, 9)) – End date of reported cases to represent in Altair Chart. The object defaults to the last entry in the provided COVID-19 cases data.

Returns

base – Base of Altair Chart.

Return type

altair.Chart

web_visualization.plot_reported_cases(county='all_counties', time_interval='daily', **kwargs)[source]¶

Create Altair Chart of reported COVID-19 cases in Norwegian counties.

Parameters

  • county (str, optional, default all_counties) – The county with the reported cases to retrieve.

    Allowed counties: all_counties, agder, innlandet, more-og-romsdal, nordland, oslo, rogaland, troms-og-finnmark, trondelag, vestfold-og-telemark, vestland, viken.

  • time_interval (str, optional, default daily) – Time interval representation of the reported cases. Can be either daily or weekly.

  • **kwargs – Arbitrary keyword arguments are passed along to chart_base().

Returns

bar – Altair Chart of reported cases.

Return type

altair.Chart

web_visualization.plot_cumulative_cases(county='all_counties', time_interval='daily', **kwargs)[source]¶

Create Altair Chart of cumulative COVID-19 cases in Norwegian counties.

Parameters

  • county (str, optional, default all_counties) – The county with the reported cases to retrieve.

    Allowed counties: all_counties, agder, innlandet, more-og-romsdal, nordland, oslo, rogaland, troms-og-finnmark, trondelag, vestfold-og-telemark, vestland, viken.

  • time_interval (str, optional, default daily) – Time interval representation of the reported cases. Can be either daily or weekly.

  • **kwargs – Arbitrary keyword arguments are passed along to chart_base().

Returns

line – Altair Chart of cumulative cases.

Return type

altair.Chart

web_visualization.plot_both(county='all_counties', time_interval='daily', **kwargs)[source]¶

Create Altair Chart of both reported and cumulative COVID-19 cases in Norwegian counties.

Parameters

  • county (str, optional, default all_counties) – The county with the reported cases to retrieve.

    Allowed counties: all_counties, agder, innlandet, more-og-romsdal, nordland, oslo, rogaland, troms-og-finnmark, trondelag, vestfold-og-telemark, vestland, viken.

  • time_interval (str, optional, default daily) – Time interval representation of the reported cases. Can be either daily or weekly.

  • **kwargs – Arbitrary keyword arguments are passed along to chart_base().

Returns

both – Altair Chart of both reported and cumulative cases.

Return type

altair.Chart

web_visualization.main()[source]¶

The main /home page serves the plot.html template

web_visualization.plot()[source]¶

POST requests to /plot.json

The response will be the vega chart spec as JSON

web_visualization.serve_sphinx_docs(path='index.html')[source]¶

The /help page serves the html documentation generated by Sphinx
